testCases.explanation: Grid has step sizes [2,3]. Routes from bottom to top of a 2x3 grid: 3 distinct paths.
4x4 grid: C(6,2)=15, but with step constraint: 20 routes.

description: Given an array `nums` representing the dimensions of a rectangular grid, count the number of distinct routes to climb from one corner to the opposite corner, moving only right or up.

examples.explanation: In a 2-row, 3-column grid, there are 3 routes going only right or down.
